Q_DESC:
Determine the number of consecutive integer numbers which when added together will give a value equal to or just less than a maximum value that the user gives. 
Hint: The number of integers starting from 1 that would add up to maximum value 220 is 20.
That is, 1+ 2 + 3 + 4 + ... + 20 = 210
If we add 21 with the above the condition clashes since sum =221>max.value
